text: Typhoon Rai, known in the Philippines as Typhoon Odette, was a tropical cyclone over the South China Sea which recently passed through the Philippines. It also traveled to Vietnam. Rai caused severe and widespread damage throughout the Southern Philippines, killing at least 376. == Retirement == On February 2022 PAGASA decided that the name of Odette, will never be used in naming from its rotation annual typhoon names, rampaging the northeastern Mindanao. Causing P1 billion, And replaced the name with in 2025 name list. ==References== Category:December 2021 events Rai Rai Rai
title: Typhoon Rai
